text: Oh Mphrofethi! Gqugquzela abakholwayo ukuthi balwe (endleleni kaMvelinqangi), uma kukhona phakathi kwenu abangamashumi amabili ababekezelayo bayonqoba abangamakhulu amabili (kubona) futhi uma kunina kunabayikhulu bayonqoba abayinkulungwane kulabo abangakholwayo ngenxa yokuthi bona bangabantu abangaqondi
